thread.title: Vinnie Jones opens up about battling skin cancer at the same time as his wife Tanya

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Vinnie Jones opens up about battling skin cancer at the same time as his wife Tanya

persons.name: susanna reid piers morgan vinnie jones

text:
Vinnie Jones opens up about battling skin cancer at the same time as his wife Tanya The footballer turned Hollywood actor poked a lot of fun at Piers   Share   Comments By Vicki Newman 08:20, 22 FEB 2017 Updated 09:22, 22 FEB 2017 Celebs Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Watch this video again Video will play in  Vinnie Jones teases Piers Morgan in hilarious interview Share this video Watch Next     celebs   Vinnie Jones put Piers Morgan in his place on Good Morning Britain - and viewers absolutely loved it.
The footballer turned Hollywood actor was chatting with Piers and Susanna Reid live from LA on Wednesday morning's show.
The star shook things up on the show by smashing a custard pie in entertainment reporter Ross King's face to wish him a happy birthday, plugging his "fine flooring" business and bantering with Piers.
Vinnie was on the show to talk about battling skin cancer at the same time as his wife, Tanya.
Read More Piers Morgan says Scarlett Moffatt's success has "effectively ended" her parents' TV career after Gogglebox axe Vinnie Jones and wife Tanya Jones had skin cancer at the same time (Photo: Gregg DeGuire/PictureGroup.com) He told the hosting duo that he'd had his "cut out" and as just "getting on with it".
However, he revealed that he takes more precautions now, such as wearing a hat to avoid the sun during his daily golf sessions.
But he praised his wife Tanya, who he calls the love of his life, saying: "She's fantastic, she's good, very good. It's her 30-year heart transplant anniversary this June so we'll be going out to celebrate that."
Piers then praised his Hollywood pal for not touching alcohol for four-years and being "clean".
And that's when the "legendary" bants between them began.
Vinnie had major bants with Piers (Photo: ITV) Vinnie said: "Clean? You say it as if I'm an addict of something, give me a break! I just decided to give up drinking so my life could blossom like yours, Piers!
"But they haven't run me out of America yet like they did to you unfortunatley."
The actor also revealed that he'd bought a gun earlier that morning, before saying it was a joke.
Piers then mentioned that Vinnie regularly plays golf with stars like Joe Pesci and Justin Timberlake, and Vinnie wound him up even more.
"No, they play with me," he said.
"I saw Justin Timberlake the other day and he didn't have much nice to say about you, Piers."
Vinnie added that he couldn't possibly tell the British public how many words Justin had to say about Piers.
(Photo: ITV) He added: "The view of you over here is not very good, Piers, I have to not mention it any more."
Piers then asked Vinnie about his new job selling carpets.
Vinnie retorted: "No Piers, I have a company that deals with fine flooring, it's called Deacon Jones." He went on to offer viewers the chance to apply for a job.
Viewers were loving Vinnie's quick wit in dealing with Piers.
Viewers loved the banter between Piers and Vinnie (Photo: ITV) One said: "@piersmorgan interview with vinnie jones this morning was hilarious..#bothlegends"
Another wrote: "Vinnie Jones interview with you Piers, an absolute blinder; the funniest ever!!!!"
One fan said: "Quality banter between @piersmorgan and Vinnie Jones this morning on #GMB"
"Don't normally watch GMB but saw Vinnie Jones was on. What an absolute legend. Brilliant," said one viewer.
And another wrote: "Am loving Vinnie Jones on GMB taking the p**s out of Piers! Making me laugh out loud" [sic]
* Good Morning Britain, ITV, weekdays 6am - 8.30am
